page.title: 14GOVERNMENT
page.content: GOVERNMENT. The area comes under Waverley District Council,which is the rating authority responsible for collecting refuse,council housing,local planning and conservation,museums,swimming pools and parks. One representative is elected to sit on Surrey County Council.Surrey C.C. are responsible for Highways and Byways,for the Police and for Education,Careers services,Youth and Community services,Libraries,Gypsy caravan sites,Town andCountry structure planning,Refuse disposal and Social services.There is one police officer,a woman,in Churt. INFORMATION SYSTEMS. There is no library,but a mobile library vanequipped with a selection of fiction,non-fiction,and children's books,visits once a week.
